detectors.description:
StakingRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakingRewards__14.sol#643-654) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(rewardsDuration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakingRewards__14.sol#645)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakingRewards__14.sol#648)
